Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; exterior: painted decoration consisting of possible sphinx seated to left (part of haunch with added red remaining).
Curator's comments: Sphinxes are usually depicted facing left on Simple Animal Style chalices.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1125) (phase 2)
